definition: fishing and hunting/fig. to loot/to plunder

sentences.english: Primitive tribes lived by fishing, hunting and gathering.
sentences.chinese: 原始部落靠漁獵採集爲生。

sentences.english: Game wardens will enforce the fishing restrictions for the cash-strapped state.
sentences.chinese: 漁獵監督官將爲這個資金窘困的州執行捕魚限制令。

sentences.english: Many described the department’s account of his capture and death as suspicious.
sentences.chinese: 許多人都質疑漁獵部抓捕並處死馬喬的動機。

sentences.english: Most of the people in the area trapped and fished.
sentences.chinese: 這個地區的人們有設陷阱和漁獵的習慣。

sentences.english: In an open season the fishermen can land many fish.
sentences.chinese: 在漁獵解禁期，漁民們可捕到很多魚。

definition: Lelang commandery (108 BC-313 AD), one of four Han dynasty commanderies in north Korea
armed enemy of the nation/enemy of the Emperor/fig. championship challenger/contender opposing champion in sporting contest
Paiwan, one of the indigenous peoples of Taiwan
to go on a hunting expedition
